Serialized Form

  • Package main

    • Class main.GamePanel

      class GamePanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • FPS
          int FPS
          the amount of Frames Per Second the game is running
        • gameThread
          Thread gameThread
          sets up a game thread
        • keyH
          KeyHandler keyH
          sets up keyhandler to read keys
        • maxScreenCol
          int maxScreenCol
          this is the ammount of colums for the GUI
        • maxScreenRow
          int maxScreenRow
          this is the amount of rows in the GUi
        • originalTileSize
          int originalTileSize
          this is setting the game by 16x16 pixels
        • player
          Player player
          sets up a new player and connects it to the keyhandler to move
        • playerSpeed
          int playerSpeed
          sets how fast the player moves
        • playerX
          int playerX
          player starting position x
        • playerY
          int playerY
          player starting at y
        • scale
          int scale
          this is scaling up the pixels by a factor of 3 the 16 pixels dont look incredibly small
        • screenHeight
          int screenHeight
          sets up the height of the GUI
        • screenWidth
          int screenWidth
          sets up the width of the GUI
        • tileSize
          int tileSize
          this is setting the tile size by pixels * the scale that you want your game to be at
